original_text: My doctrine shall drop as the rain, my speech shall distil as the dew, as the small rain upon the tender herb, and as the showers upon the grass:
korean_text: 내 교훈은 비처럼 내리고 내 말은 이슬처럼 맺히나니 연한 풀 위의 가는 비 같고 채소 위의 단비 같도다

sentences.original_text: My doctrine shall drop as the rain,
my speech shall distil as the dew,
as the small rain upon the tender herb,
and as the showers upon the grass:
